statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.name: defensiveRebounds
statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.

article.description: Fletcher Magee scored 21 points and Wofford knocked down 17 3-pointers to roll to a 117-77 win over NAIA Allen on Tuesday night.
article.headline: Magree scores 21, Wofford defeats Allen 117-77
article.story: SPARTANBURG, S.C. -- Fletcher Magee scored 21 points and Wofford knocked down 17 3-pointers to roll to a 117-77 win over NAIA Allen on Tuesday night. Eric Garcia and Jaylen Allen combined to hit 8 of 9 behind the arc and scored 13 points apiece for the Terriers (1-1). Wofford was 17 of 27 from long range and shot 68 percent overall (42 of 63). Ryan Sawvell's jumper 4 minutes in capped an 11-0 run that put the Terriers up 13-2. Allen's 3 ended a 14-0 run for a 33-10 lead at the 10:57 mark and Wofford had a 30-point lead at the half, 69-39. Arvel Atwater had 16 points for the Yellowjackets (1-3), making 4 of their 5 3-pointers. Demetrius Richardson added 14 points and Avery Harris 13. Wofford had a 46-25 advantage on the boards, with Dishon Lowery grabbing eight, and had 27 assists, six from Donovan Theme-Love.
